commentText: helper method to construct the hdfsPath from the CamelFileName String or Expression_@param exchange_@return
codeText: private StringBuilder getHdfsPathUsingFileNameHeader(Exchange exchange) {_        StringBuilder actualPath = new StringBuilder(hdfsPath)__        String fileName = ""__        Object value = exchange.getIn().getHeader(Exchange.FILE_NAME)__        if (value instanceof String) {_            fileName = exchange.getContext().getTypeConverter().convertTo(String.class, exchange, value)__        } else if (value instanceof Expression) {_            fileName =  ((Expression) value).evaluate(exchange, String.class)__        }_        return actualPath.append(fileName)__    }
